name: Enkindle (KrzyNoj)
description:
Controls:

  • A&D: Move Left/Right
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • E: Interact
  • Left-Click: Shoot/Select

Take on the role of a fire sprite in a post-darkened-sun apocalypse. Kill enemy shadow creatures with your flare and collect kindling to upgrade your abilities, replenish your depleting light source, or light the various bonfires in the neighborhood. Light all five fires to save the neighborhood and win the game. If you get hit too many times by enemies or if your light runs out it's game over.

Tips/Spoilers:

  • You start with just enough Kindling to light the first bonfire you see. You're welcome for the freebie :).
  • While against a wall if you tap spacebar repeatedly (and don't hold a directional button) you can rocket up the sides of buildings to reach the top quickly.
  • Some buildings have secrets on the insides. Keep an eye out.
  • There are four diary pages scattered throughout the neighborhood. Collect them all for a bit of story.
